ygData.msgSnippet: Ah! I m loaded with posts AGAIN!  Yes. It was our temporary base until it was destroyed beyond recognition. Then rebuilt and launched to a safer location.

Ah! I'm loaded with posts AGAIN!

" Yes. It was our temporary base until it was destroyed beyond recognition. 
Then rebuilt and launched to a safer location.
From there we moved onto the Cybertronian Fire. It was the largest war ship 
then but soon it was outclassed and outgunned. Meeting the same fate as the 
Ark. Soo...it was dismantled and what remains were left were used to help 
fortify the Maximal City."

* Iron Raptor began to walk away from the city a little, at a slow pace.*

" As for allies...we don't have many...if any anymore.  There are a few 
factions that have aided us, even the Alliance at times. But the Maximals 
are basically alone on this planet.  Cheated, ransacked and generally beaten 
beyond recognition. That has been our fate so far."

* It was lack of leadership, she knew. There were great warriors here but 
with poor leadership all they've been getting was beaten up. And it wasn't 
hard to notice that all of the battles they HAVE WON...weren't led by her at 
all.
< I was never made to lead. I was made to follow.>*
